label: Bone 6874
keywords: Neolithic and Bronze Age cattle data from Switzerland

producedBy.label: Neolithic and Bronze Age cattle data from Switzerland
producedBy.description: Cattle biometrical data from sites across Switzerland dated to the late Neolithic and Bronze Age (c4500 – 800 cal BC). Basic NISP data are also provided for the main species.
